description: a(n) = index k of the column in which n is found, if the columns k = 1, 2, 3, ... are initially filled with numbers T(k-1)+1, ..., T(k) = k(k+1)/2, and when n is found in column k, then the top element of each subsequent column (k+1, k+2, ...) is moved to the top of the previous column (k, k+1, ...).
